page.title: 03Employment and employers
page.content: The employment structure of the area is traditionally and predominantly {heavy industrial}in character. Distington Engineering Company is the largest employer followed by the Dock, {light engineering}works, and industrial services (including storage and garages facilities). Teachers, shopkeepers, (the not to be forgotten) housewives and {service employees}conclude the list. There is considerable reserve of industrial land on the southern side of the River Derwent (The Marsh and Quay) and on the northern side at Oldside which Allerdale District Council are attempting to promote as industrial estates. This coastal belt as been designated as a Government sponsored{Enterprise {Zone.
